name: Gaian trail
description:
Gaian Trail

A simple text-based adventure game made for the 2018 Terminal Jam.

Help 3 helpless souls navigate their way back to earth from a disaster-stricken Mars Colony via an escape pod using the power of multiple-choice options.  

Main Features

  • State of the art 4 bit colour palette (a whopping total of 16 wholly different colours)
  • 10 FPS silky smooth animations
  • A healthy dose of RNG
  • Exceedingly short playtime

System requirements

  • 32/64 bit Windows operating system
  • .Net Framework 4.5 or above ( preinstalled on Windows 8 and above , Note: application is incompatible with Mono Framework)

Running the game

  • Unzip file into a folder of your choosing
  • Run executable to start
